acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

depositCollateral(address,uint256).details: Transfers tokens and updates position state

mintSPIUSD(address,uint256).details: Reverts if resulting LTV exceeds MAX_LTV

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: This function is intentionally empty to block the ability to renounce ownership since this contract requires ongoing management for adding supported collateral token integrations and updating parameters.

params.priceFeedAddress: Price feed address. Use address(0) to remove support.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

burnSPIUSD(address,uint256).notice: Burns SPIUSD from user and updates position state

depositCollateral(address,uint256).notice: Deposits supported collateral into user's position

depositCollateralAndMintSPIUSD(address,u.notice: Deposits collateral and mints SPIUSD in a single transaction

getTokenUsdValue(address,uint256).notice: Converts token amount to USD value using Chainlink price feed

getUserPositionCollateralValue(address,a.notice: Returns total collateral value (in USD) for a user position

getUserPositionLTV(address,address).notice: Returns the current Loan-to-Value ratio of a user's position

liquidate(address,address).notice: Allows third party to liquidate an unsafe position and claim collateral

mintSPIUSD(address,uint256).notice: Mints SPIUSD against user's deposited collateral

redeemCollateralAndBurnSPIUSD(address,ui.notice: Burns SPIUSD and redeems corresponding collateral in one transaction

renounceOwnership().notice: Overrides renounceOwnership to prevent ownership renunciation

setCollateralTokenSupport(address[],addr.notice: Adds or removes support for a collateral token.
